DOC.brief_summary: This phase II single center study administer two course myeloablative consolidation chemotherapy follow autologous peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) rescue patient high-risk neuroblastoma complete induction chemotherapy ( independent study ) . Ideally , patient begin consolidation chemotherapy later 8 week start Induction Cycle # 5 ; however strongly recommended begin consolidation within 4-6 week start Induction Cycle # 5 .
